status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4difv","text":"Seed HeLa cells in 15 cm dishes and grow until confluence. Treat the cells with DMSO or the mitophagy-inducing cocktail Oligomycin/Antimycin A (O/A) if needed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7nljh","text":"Collect HeLa cells by trypsinization and resuspension in DMEM medium. Centrifuge the cells at  . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":94,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"300","duration":600,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"A386AAF0141311EE968C9F3D303A24C9","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6sqcv","text":"Remove the PBS and resuspend the cell pellet in   mitochondrial isolation buffer, which was cooled to  . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":48,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":102,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1sqa","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"94voo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"BC782A70141311EE968C9F3D303A24C9","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"BF5F44D0141311EE968C9F3D303A24C9","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"180kr","text":"Note that the mitochondrial isolation buffer is prepared fresh on the day itself.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ekotq","text":"To lyse cells without damaging the mitochondria, pipet the   cell suspension up and down (15-20x) with a 26.5G needle. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":59,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4mks1","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c9h0d","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a6kc1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"D84F3DB0141311EE968C9F3D303A24C9","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6nlea","text":"This should lyse the plasma membrane but leave organelles intact.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
